mapper.select: select resume.* from resume inner join (select apply.* from apply inner join (select recruit.* from recruit inner join company on company.company_id=recruit.recruit_company_id where company_id=#{companyId}) currentCompany on apply.apply_recruit_id=currentCompany.recruit_id) currentComRescruit on resume.resume_id=currentComRescruit.apply_resume_id
mapper.update: update resume set resume_read_count=resume_read_count+1 where resume_id=#{resumeId}
mapper.select: SELECT totalCount, totalPage, currentPage, case when currentPage=0 then 1 else 0 end as isFirst, case when currentPage=totalPage-1 then 1 else 0 end as isLast FROM ( select count(*) totalCount, ceil(count(*)/20) totalPage, ${page} currentPage, 0 isFirst, 0 isLast FROM resume ) b

select resume.*, result.count from resume left join (select *, count(*) count from (select c2.* from (select category.* from (select recruit.* from recruit inner join company on company.company_id=recruit.recruit_company_id where company_id=#{companyId}) r inner join category on r.recruit_id=category.category_recruit_id group by category_name) c1 join (SELECT * FROM category WHERE category_resume_id is not null) c2 on c1.category_name=c2.category_name) list group by category_resume_id) result on resume.resume_id=result.category_resume_id order by count desc limit 20 offset #{startNum}
select r.* from resume r where resume_user_id=#{userId}
select * from resume order by resume_created_at desc limit 20 offset #{startNum}
select * from resume order by FIELD(resume_education, '대학원졸업', '4년제대학졸업', '3년제대학졸업', '2년제대학졸업', '고졸'), resume_education limit 20 offset #{startNum}
select * from resume order by FIELD(resume_career, '6년이상', '3년이상 ~ 5년미만', '1년이상 ~ 3년미만', '1년미만', '신입'), resume_education limit 20 offset #{startNum}
select sum(resume_read_count) resumeReadCount from resume where resume_user_id=#{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO resume( resume_title, resume_education, resume_career, resume_photo, resume_link, resume_user_id, resume_read_count, resume_created_at ) VALUES( #{resumeTitle}, #{resumeEducation}, #{resumeCareer}, #{resumePhoto}, #{resumeLink}, #{resumeUserId},0, now() )
